ManSection.Returns: Returns the base field of v.
ManSection.Description: For a cvec v. For q=p^d \leq 65536 this returns the &GAP; object GF(p,d). For larger finite fields this uses the &GAP; library to form a field object, which basically only knows its Size and finiteness, Zero and One. One can probably not do much more with this. Probably one can form a polynomial ring over it.
